Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix medication bugs: missing dose carry-forward and deprecated columns

Fixes two medication issues:

1. Missing medication carry-forward for Senna, Melatonin, Metoprolol
   - Extended get-entries.js to fetch columns T, U, V \(was only fetching up to S\)
   - Added senna, melatonin, metoprolol to API response payload
   - Renamed oxaloacetate to oxaloacetateNew to avoid conflicts with deprecated column E

2. Deprecated columns displayed in History cards
   - Removed old modafinil \(column H\) and oxaloacetate \(column E\) from history display
   - Added comprehensive medication list showing all 12 meds with doses
   - Medications only show when taken \(not "Off"\)

Files modified:
- api/get-entries.js: Extended range from A:S to A:V, added missing med fields
- src/components/EntryHistory.jsx: Replaced deprecated med display with new med list

EOF
\)")
